title: Setup separate domain jalsah-ai.app
description: Create separate domain jalsah-ai.app to communicate with existing system https://jalsah.app/ through API and JWT plugin

title: Create patient interface for doctor browsing
description: Provide interface for patients to browse doctors and choose appropriate therapist

title: Set 45-minute online-only appointments
description: Available booking appointments are 45 minutes duration online only

title: Add therapist visibility toggle
description: Determine therapist appearance on site based on toggle button in therapist profile page

title: Create main page with two patient options
description: Provide main page (after login) with two options to help patient choose therapist

title: Integrate ChatGPT for diagnosis
description: First option: communicate with ChatGPT to determine appropriate diagnosis and recommend therapists belonging to this diagnosis

title: Add diagnosis management in A Shrinks plugin
description: Add place in A Shrinks plugin control panel to add diagnoses and assign diagnoses to each doctor-ranked user (multiple diagnoses per doctor)

title: Add browse available doctors button
description: Second option: button to browse available doctors

title: Allow admin to add therapist ratings per specialty
description: Site admin can add ratings for therapist according to each specialty assigned to therapist in profile page, used later for filtering/recommendation by highest rating

title: Store sessions in same table with distinction
description: System will store sessions in same current sessions table but need to distinguish sessions booked through jalsah-ai.app for different handling

title: Add AI flag for jalsah-ai.app bookings
description: Any booking from jalsah-ai.app will be marked with flag like discount products - green circle with 'AI' text

title: Create login/register interface for non-logged users
description: Site interface when not logged in will ask user to login or create account

title: Implement token-based login
description: Login through token system

title: Create account registration form
description: Account creation requires: first name, last name, age, email, phone number, WhatsApp, country (dropdown with Egypt first, then Arab countries, then alphabetical), password

title: Implement email activation system
description: Upon registration, account must be activated via email with resend activation code after 1 minute

title: Show activation success message and redirect
description: Upon activation, show success message and redirect user to main page

title: Check existing users during registration
description: During registration, check if user already exists and update/add missing data if found

title: Create patient bookings history page
description: Page to display patient's previous and current bookings made only through jalsah-ai.app

title: Define session completion criteria
description: Session becomes previous when therapist ends session or sets attendance status using snks_sessions_actions table

title: Hide jalsah-ai.app sessions from main system
description: Ensure bookings in main system (A Shrinks plugin) don't display sessions booked through jalsah-ai.app

title: Create page header with navigation
description: Page header contains logo and menu with: Main Page, Bookings, Profile, Logout

title: Add re-diagnosis option after ChatGPT diagnosis
description: After ChatGPT diagnosis (e.g., Borderline Personality Disorder), patient can click button to re-diagnose, returning to main page after confirmation

title: Show therapists for confirmed diagnosis
description: After confirming diagnosis, patient can click button to display therapists belonging to this diagnosis

title: Add therapist filtering options
description: Ability to filter therapists by rating (default), lowest price, or nearest appointment

title: Display therapist ranking numbers
description: Based on therapist rating, show ranking number in therapist list (5-star gets #1, 4-star gets #2, etc.)

title: Add admin setting for recommended therapists count
description: Admin option to set number of recommended therapists to show in diagnosis-based therapist list

title: Design therapist card layout
description: Therapist card contains: name, image, specialty, certificates gallery (lightbox), 'Why this therapist is best for your diagnosis?' text

title: Add diagnosis-specific text fields
description: For each diagnosis assigned to therapist, add text box explaining why therapist is suitable for this diagnosis

title: Create new WordPress user fields for jalsah-ai.app
description: Add new fields in WordPress user page specific to jalsah-ai.app functionality

title: Display session price and nearest appointment
description: Show additional info without new fields: 45-minute session price and nearest appointment details

title: Add book nearest appointment option
description: Option to book nearest appointment with verification that appointment hasn't been booked by someone else

title: Create browse other appointments interface
description: Browse other appointments option showing available dates/days first, then times for selected day (45-minute sessions only)

title: Implement cart-based booking system
description: Booking system works like cart addition (not WooCommerce cart) - separate system allowing multiple appointment bookings

title: Add appointment to cart on click
description: Add to cart when clicking appointment (not day), clicking same appointment again removes from cart

title: Make cart operations AJAX-based
description: Cart operations should not reload the page

title: Handle different therapist cart conflicts
description: When adding appointment for different therapist, show message explaining and ask to empty cart for new booking

title: Hide other therapist appointments when browsing
description: When browsing other appointments for different therapist, hide previous therapist's appointments

title: Create browse all therapists page
description: Browse all therapists page similar to recommended but without ranking numbers, random display each time, 20 therapists per page

title: Add all therapists filtering options
description: Sort by random, lowest price, nearest appointment, or search specific doctor in all therapists page

title: Modify therapist card for all therapists page
description: Replace 'Why best for diagnosis' with general 'About therapist' text requiring additional WordPress text box

title: Create cart page with appointment details
description: Cart page shows appointment data in separate tables with: therapist name, online session type, 45-minute duration, session date/day, session time

title: Add remove appointment from cart option
description: Allow patient to remove any appointment from cart

title: Display appointment change terms
description: Show appointment change terms below cart

title: Create payment details section
description: Payment details section with: therapist fees, additional fees, total, coupon discount box

title: Create temporary payment calculation
description: Create payment calculation with dummy data temporarily until real formula is provided

title: Process WooCommerce order on booking confirmation
description: On confirm booking, create necessary WooCommerce orders - single order with all appointments, status pending until payment completion

title: Store booking data in order meta
description: Store booking data appropriately in order using meta key with JSON value, mark bookings as from jalsah-ai.app

title: Link patient to bookings after payment
description: Don't link patient to bookings until payment is completed

title: Send payment link on order creation
description: On order creation (pending payment), return success and send payment link via email and display in cart page

title: Implement 15-minute payment timeout
description: If payment not completed within 15 minutes, cancel order and return bookings to waiting status

title: Add 15-minute countdown timer
description: Show 15-minute countdown timer, redirect to main page when expired

title: Clear cart after payment completion
description: Clear cart only after payment completion via webhook from jalsah.app notifying jalsah-ai.app of successful payment

title: Handle incomplete payment timeout
description: If payment incomplete after 15 minutes, allow re-requesting appointments with verification (remove booked appointments and notify patient)

title: Add session attendance instructions
description: Add session attendance instructions to bookings page

title: Display upcoming and past bookings
description: Show upcoming and past bookings on bookings page

title: Design booking card layout
description: Booking card contains: therapist image, therapist name, detailed session time, start session button, change session button, prescription button (therapist only)/view prescription button (patient)

title: Implement session change rules
description: Session change allowed only 24 hours before session time, free once, disable button when change not possible

title: Add AJAX session time change
description: On change session button click, inject therapist schedules via AJAX below card for new time selection, apply change immediately without page reload

title: Create custom jalsah-ai.app session page
description: Create custom session page specific to jalsah-ai.app

title: Handle session exit redirects
description: On session exit: patient returns to bookings page, doctor returns to https://jalsah.app/account-setting/

title: Implement doctor session end timing rule
description: Doctor can end session for no-show patient only after 15 minutes past session time

title: Hide start session button after therapist ends
description: Hide start session button only if therapist ended the session

title: Sort upcoming sessions by proximity
description: Sort upcoming sessions from nearest to farthest

title: Sort past sessions by recency
description: Sort past sessions from newest to oldest

title: Add book new session button to past sessions
description: Past sessions contain only button to book new session with same therapist

title: Style AI bookings in green theme
description: In jalsah.app doctor bookings page: AI session bookings appear in green shades with 'Via Jalsah AI' label above

title: Hide booking management buttons for AI sessions
description: For AI sessions only: hide delay, postpone, edit buttons

title: Add diagnosis info to AI booking cards
description: Add diagnosis to AI booking card: 'AI-provided diagnosis' if exists, 'No diagnosis' if not

title: Hide mobile number for AI sessions
description: Hide mobile number in AI session booking cards

title: Add file sharing popup for doctors
description: Add button opening popup allowing doctor to send file (image/document/video) to patient's email, max 25MB file size

title: Create file storage system
description: Provide storage space for shared files in session page in admin dashboard

title: Add attendance confirmation for 45-minute AI sessions
description: For all 45-minute AI sessions after time expires: doctor can set patient attendance status with 'Did patient attend?' button

title: Create attendance confirmation popup
description: Attendance popup with options: 'Patient attended without issues' or 'Patient didn't attend despite waiting 15+ minutes, notify site admin'

title: Add attendance confirmation dialog
description: Confirm attendance choice with confirmation dialog showing selected option, allow canceling back to options

title: Show session credit success message
description: On attendance confirmation, close popups and show 'Session credit successfully added to your balance' message

title: Implement profit transfer after session completion
description: Transfer amount to doctor balance after session completion confirmation, not on payment like jalsah.app

title: Set percentage-based profit sharing
description: Don't add full session price to doctor balance, add percentage of session value instead

title: Configure individual doctor profit percentages
description: Set profit percentage per doctor individually from WordPress admin, with general settings: first session percentage, subsequent sessions percentage (applies when same patient with same therapist)

title: Disable doctor coupons for AI sessions
description: Doctor-specific coupons not valid for AI sessions

title: Show AI session details in transaction log
description: For AI bookings in transaction log, clearly show: booking method (via Jalsah AI), doctor's net profit (percentage allocated)

title: Add separate AI profile image field
description: Add separate field for uploading custom image for AI sessions display, independent of main profile image

title: Create AI sessions admin management page
description: Admin page for managing AI-specific sessions with necessary filters

title: Enable admin switch user feature
description: Enable 'Switch User' feature for admin to switch to any AI patient account and view their dashboard exactly as they see it

title: Create admin login page for patient accounts
description: Admin login page allowing login to any account with email only plus admin password confirmation

title: Add AI doctors count setting
description: Settings page to set number of doctors shown per diagnosis in AI (e.g., top 10 or 20 doctors), manually set by admin

title: Add jalsah-ai users filter
description: Add filter in users page to identify users registered through jalsah-ai

title: Add doctors by diagnosis filter
description: Add filter in users page to show all doctors linked to each specific diagnosis with session count per diagnosis

title: Enable diagnosis-based doctor sorting
description: Ability to sort doctors by custom rating within diagnosis

title: Add bulk messaging system
description: Ability to select users and send WhatsApp via API, email, or both

title: Create detailed analytics page with dynamic filters
description: Analytics page with filters: users who didn't interact with AI, started but didn't reach diagnosis, completed diagnosis + specified diagnosis, booked after diagnosis, booked without AI, all who booked with session counts

title: Add repeat customer analysis
description: Page showing doctors ranked by repeat bookings from same patient, filtered by doctors getting 1, 2, 3+ sessions per patient (retention rate)

title: Configure admin email notifications
description: Send admin email with each new booking, distinguish AI bookings from regular ones, include: doctor name, patient name, appointment time

title: Send new user registration emails
description: Send email when new user registers in Jalsah AI

title: Create exclusive user group coupons
description: Create discount coupons for selected user groups by selecting group then creating coupon with all coupon features

title: Apply coupons to site percentage not therapist profit
description: Exclusive coupons discount from site percentage, not therapist's net profit

title: Configure coupon usage limits
description: Set coupon usage count as per-user limit or total limit (3 times per user vs 3 times total), if total then max once per user

title: Add coupon expiration dates
description: Coupons have expiration dates (can be set or unlimited)

title: Store coupon data with bookings
description: Store used coupon with booking like current jalsah.app system

title: Add AI sessions toggle to doctor profile
description: Toggle button in user profile to enable/disable doctor appearance in AI sessions (default: disabled)

title: Create AI-specific custom fields in user profile
description: Custom fields in user edit page: AI custom image, AI display name, secretary phone, diagnosis list (multiple selection), points per diagnosis, custom text per diagnosis explaining why doctor is best choice, alternative text for non-AI diagnosis display

title: Build dynamic diagnosis management system
description: System allowing dynamic addition of new diagnoses from admin panel, manual linking to any doctor, manual priority ordering

title: Create prescription system for 15-minute consultations
description: System allowing patients to book 15-minute sessions with specialized prescription doctors for medication advice

title: Add prescription doctor user role
description: Create 'prescription doctor' user role

title: Add prescription request button after session
description: After therapist completes session, show prescription button with confirmation: 'Do you think client needs medication and want to refer to psychiatrist for free medication prescription alongside your sessions?'

title: Create prescription request form
description: After clicking yes, show: 'Patient's preliminary diagnosis based on your assessment' (text box), 'Symptoms you believe need medication' (text box)

title: Send prescription request confirmation
description: On request submission, show 'Prescription service requested successfully', send WhatsApp and email to patient confirming prescription request and directing to book prescription doctor appointment

title: Disable prescription button after request
description: After successful prescription request, disable prescription button in interface and prevent backend duplication

title: Show prescription status in patient bookings
description: In patient current bookings section show: 'Prescription service requested' text and 'Book Free Appointment' button opening prescription doctor booking form

title: Create prescription doctor schedule dashboard
description: Dashboard page for prescription doctors to input available times with 20-minute intervals (1:00-1:20-1:40), set different daily schedules

title: Build prescription booking management page
description: Page for prescription booking management showing: appointment date/time, patient name, patient email, therapist name, referral reason

title: Show prescription requests only after patient booking
description: Prescription requests appear only when patient has booked the appointment

title: Default to today's prescription sessions
description: Show today's sessions by default in prescription management

title: Add prescription appointment filters
description: Filter prescription appointments by date, patient, therapist

title: Create prescription editor interface
description: Prescription editing interface with text field and file upload capability

title: Sort prescription appointments by time
description: Sort prescription appointments by nearest appointment time

title: Add repeat booking counter for prescription patients
description: Store counter for prescription bookings to mark patients with multiple bookings with special indicator

title: Display prescription sessions for patients
description: For patients show: prescription session, detailed appointment time, start session button, edit appointment button (one free edit within 24 hours)

title: Hide prescription session start button after completion
description: Hide start prescription session button after prescription doctor sends prescription to patient

title: Move completed prescription sessions to past
description: Prescription session moves to past sessions after prescription is sent

title: Create doctor ranking visibility page
description: General page for doctors to see their detailed ranking and AI visibility status

title: Integrate ChatGPT API with custom prompts
description: Program dynamic ChatGPT conversation controlled entirely through custom prompt with fixed outputs from pre-defined diagnoses

title: Send patient name and diagnosis list to ChatGPT
description: Send patient's first name (for personal conversation), programmed prompt, available diagnosis list (set from admin) to ChatGPT

title: Receive diagnosis and fetch matching doctors
description: Receive final patient diagnosis from pre-defined list only, fetch appropriate doctors from WordPress users using linked diagnosis field, sort by points

title: Enable dynamic diagnosis and doctor management
description: Allow adding new diagnoses anytime, linking any doctor to any number of diagnoses, manual doctor ordering within each diagnosis

title: Integrate WhatsApp Cloud API
description: Free service with payment only for sent messages, official WhatsApp API following tutorial videos

title: Send WhatsApp notifications to doctors
description: Send WhatsApp notifications to doctors for: new AI booking (with notification + email + WhatsApp confirmation), appointment time changes

title: Send WhatsApp notifications to patients
description: Send WhatsApp to patients for: session booking (detailed session info, no SMS), appointment changes (new timing), 22-hour reminder, 1-hour reminder, therapist session entry notification, prescription request from therapist

title: Send targeted campaign messages
description: Send custom offer messages to selected patients through statistics page campaigns
